data.text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai,25.1 Jeremiah 49.1-6; Ezekiel 21.28-32; Amos 1.13-15; Zephaniah 2.8-11
“Kooe go tangada dangada, haga halauwa ina tenua go Ammon.

Helekai ang gi digaula gi hagalongo mai gi nia mee ala e helehelekai iei Au, go Tagi go Yihowah: Goodou gu tenetene huoloo gi di godou mmada gi dogu Hale Daumaha dela gu haga gulugulua, mo di godou mmada gi tenua Israel dela gu mooho, mo di godou gidee digau Judah ala guu lahi gi daha.

Idimaa i di godou tenetene, gei Au ga hagau ia nia madawaawa mai di anggowaa i bahi i dua gi llooia gi hagamagedaa ina goodou. Digaula ga lloo ia ga hagaduu aga nadau hale laa i lodo di godou henua gaa noho ai. Digaula gaa gai godou huwa laagau ga inu nia milugu ala go godou meegai donu.
Gei Au gaa hai di waahale Rabbah gii hai di nadau gowaa e dugu ai nadau ‘camel’, gei tenua go Ammon hagatau gii hai di nadau gowaa e noho ai nia siibi, bolo gi iloo e goodou bolo Au go Dimaadua.
“Malaa, aanei la nia mee ala e helekai ai Tagi go Yihowah: Goodou gu paapaa godou lima ge duhiduhi tenetene. Goodou ala gu de hiihai gi tenua go Israel.

Idimaa i di godou dee hiihai, gei Au gaa wanga goodou gi nia henua ala i golo gi gaiaa ina goodou, mo di kae godou goloo huogodoo. Au ga daaligi goodou gi daha, gaa hidi ai goodou ga deai di godou henua ai. Gei goodou ga iloo laa bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.”

Aanei la nia mee ala e helekai ai Tagi go Yihowah, “Idimaa Moab gu helekai bolo Judah le e hai hua be nia henua ala i golo,25.8 Isaiah 15.1—16.14; 25.10-12; Jeremiah 48.1-47; Amos 2.1-3; Zephaniah 2.8-11
gei Au gaa hai tauwa gii gila gii hai ang gi nia waahale huogodoo ala e loohi di geinga o Moab, mo nia waahale ala koia e humalia huoloo, go Beth Jeshimoth, Baal Meon, mo Kiriathaim.
Au ga dumaalia gi nia madawaawa mai di anggowaa dela i baahi dua o Jordan gi hagamagedaa ina Moab, gadoo be Ammon, bolo Moab gi hagalee e hai di weei.
Au ga hagaduadua Moab, gei digaula ga iloo laa bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.”

Aanei la nia mee ala e helekai ai Tagi go Yihowah, “Digau Edom guu tala di hui gi Judah haga huaidu, gei di hai huaidu deenei dela ne hidi mai ai di huaidu damanaiee gi Edom.25.12 Isaiah 34.5-17; 63.1-6; Jeremiah 49.7-22; Ezekiel 35.1-15; Amos 1.11-12; Obadiah 1-14; Malachi 1.2-5

Malaa, deenei gei Au ga hagadele bolo Au ga hagaduadua Edom, ga daaligi nia daangada huogodoo mo nia manu huogodoo di gowaa deelaa. Gei Au gaa hai di gowaa gi hai hua di anga henua, tugi i di waahale Teman gaa hana gaa tugi i di waahale Dedan, gei nia daangada gaa mmade i tauwa.

Agu daangada Israel gaa pono dogu lohongo, gaa tala di hui ang gi Edom. Digaula gaa hai Edom gi longono nia mahi o dogu hagawelewele. Edom ga iloo laa be dogu hagawelewele la ne aha.” Aanei la nnelekai mai baahi Tagi go Yihowah.

Aanei la nia mee ala e helekai ai Tagi go Yihowah, “Digau Philistia guu hai di nadau huaidu e tala di hui haga huaidu ang gi nadau hagadaumee mai hua i mua, ga daaligi digaula i lodo di nadau hagadugina ginaadou.25.15 Isaiah 14.29-31; Jeremiah 47.1-7; Joel 3.4-8; Amos 1.6-8; Zephaniah 2.4-7; Zechariah 9.5-7
Deenei laa, Au e hagailoo bolo Au gaa hai tauwa gi Philistia, ga hagammaa digaula gi daha. Gei Au ga daaligi digau huogodoo ala gaa dubu i golo ala e noho i lodo di gowaa baba o Philistia.
Au ga hagaduadua digaula haga huaidu, gaa tala di hui gi digaula i nia mee huogodoo. Digaula ga longono nia mahi o dogu hagawelewele, gei digaula ga iloo laa bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.”
